content: Users which you selected in the previous step will be imported into groups created in {{serviceName}}. Groups will appear in the {{contactsName}} section.

comment.text: The translation key "GroupsDescription" is used to describe the action of importing selected users into groups created in a service. This text appears in a data import component and helps users understand how their selections will be used.

usage.context:
<ImportSection
 isChecked={importOptions.importGroups}
 onChange={(e) => onChange(e, "importGroups")}
 sectionName={t("Common:Groups")}
 description={t("Settings:GroupsDescription", {
 serviceName,
 contactsName: t("Common:Contacts"),
 })}
 exportSection={{
 sectionName: t("Common:Groups"),

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'imported' (from the English content) is translated as 'входирани' (vhodini) in Bulgarian. While technically correct, a more natural and common translation for 'imported' in this context would be 'вносени' (vnoseni). 'Входирани' implies something being entered into a system, whereas 'вносени' directly relates to importing.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Потребителите, които сте избрали в предишната стъпка, ще бъдат вносени в групи, създадени в {{serviceName}}.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'huoneisiin' (rooms) is used instead of 'ryhmiin' (groups). The English text specifically refers to 'groups', so the translation should reflect that.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Käyttäjät, jotka valitsit edellisessä vaiheessa tuodaan ryhmiin, jotka on luotu {{serviceName}}ssa. Ryhmät ilmestyvät {{contactsName}}-osioon.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "qu'on a créé" is not the most natural or precise translation of "created in {{serviceName}}". It uses an impersonal construction that could be improved.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Les groupes qui ont été créés dans {{serviceName}}

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While not strictly incorrect, "vers" can be replaced with a more appropriate preposition.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Les utilisateurs que vous avez sélectionnés à l'étape précédente seront importés dans les groupes créés dans {{serviceName}}

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Armenian translation includes colons after each sentence, which is not typical for this type of instruction. It makes the tone a bit formal and stilted.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider removing the colons after each sentence for a more natural flow. For example, change «Խմբերը կհայտնվեն «{{contactsName}}» բաժնում:» to «Խմբերը կհայտնվեն «{{contactsName}}» բաժնում».

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'පෙරvious' seems to be a typo and doesn's correspond to any proper Sinhala word. It likely intends to convey 'previous'.
The phrase 'සාදන ලද' is slightly awkward. A more natural phrasing would be better. It implies 'created' which is understood but could be more elegant.
The English phrase 'Users which you selected' is translated literally. A more natural Sinhala phrasing would be 'ඔබ තෝරාගත් අය'.
The English phrase 'Users which you selected' is better translated as '您选择的用户' rather than '您在前一步选择的用户'. The 'in the previous step' is redundant and makes the Chinese less natural.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: 您选择的用户将被导入到在{{serviceName}}中创建的群组。这些群组将显示在{{contactsName}}部分。
